caption.paragraph:
Fig. 5.
Chilocorus melas Weise, 1898
. a . Dorsal view. b . Lateral view. c . Frontal view. d . Abdomen. e . Penis. f . Apex of penis. g . Tegmen, lateral view. h . Tegmen, ventral view. i . ovipositor. Scale bars: 0.1 mm. (SCAU)
